QuestData.Title: Offensive Behavior
QuestData.Description:
Fine work, $p. We've advanced with minimal casualties.
From this new forward position, we can strike directly at the enemy commander. The troops you rallied will join the attack. Together, we will bring this battle to a decisive end.
Locate General Alver and sound the horn.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report back to Secutor Mevix, at the forward camp.
QuestData.RewardText: Your leadership is inspiring. These troops would follow you anywhere!
